OOC: Clash and Serge are a distance apart from each other now.

BIC: Clash,=
 flying around, doesn't even notice as the missiles streak past him. Serge =
dropped to the ground, but being as big as he is, 2 of the missiles still h=
it him. Serge looked up from the ground and ahead, at Freewing. Serge turne=
d his head to the side, trying to examine this bot. How come he was being g=
anged up on? He remembered when he got to be the one with the large team, t=
he one who got to gang up on everyone, but he gave all of that up. Perplex =
walked near, and lifted one hand. A disk formed in Perplex's hand and he ai=
med it towards the ground in front of Serge...

  ----- Original Message --=

ay, January 13, 2001 2:03 AM

  As Red Bolt goes into stasis lock, Freewing notices the ever-dying robo=
t. He 
  notices the distant base, and the battle ensuing around it. He pic=
ks up Red 
  Bolt, flies behind some rocks deposits Red Bolt and flies towa=
rd the Neutral

h and Serge!
